short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dragon Ball Z Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Dragon Ball Z background. Custom DBZ wallpaper theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Refresh your screen with a new Dragon Ball Z wallpaper each time you open a tab.
2. Customize your Dragon Ball Z background through random selection or set your favorites in the wallpaper chooser.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles for quick access.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks and reminders.
7. Provides quick links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to your Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Instant game play access.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your Dragon Ball Z new tab.
